Produced by: Cecil B. DeMille Jesse Lasky  David Belasco
Article text: The Warrens of Virginia   is a 1915 American  drama film  directed by  Cecil B  DeMille   Prints of the film survive at the  George Eastman House Motion Picture Collection     1      2       As the  American Civil War  begins  Ned Burton leaves his Southern love  Agatha Warren  and joins the  Union  army  He is later protected and saved from death by Agatha in spite of her loyalty to the South
